title: Recruitment | Graduate College | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Welcome to the UIC Graduate College recruitment Web page.  Here you will find information on upcoming recruitment activities including participation in graduate fairs, national conferences and events scheduled within UIC. Faculty and staff are encouraged to participate in any of our scheduled recruitment events and/or provide us with informational materials for distribution. Additionally, you will also find links with the contact information of prospective UIC graduate students from previous recruitment activities.  Please include them when you reach out to students for your graduate programs.

UIC Faculty and staff can also access information on prospective applicants that registered to receive information about UIC graduate programs through the National Name Exchange. To view a complete list of all NNE participants filtered by discipline please click on the Fall 2019 NNE Filtered by Discipline.  You may find participants indicating Fall 2019 or Spring 2020 graduation by selecting the “Grad Year”  filter/tab.
The National McNair Scholars Directory for 2020 may be found here [forthcoming].

Please contact: Lunaire Ford, Assistant Dean, Recruitment & Diversity for more information. Click on the listed individual events to access the corresponding Excel spreadsheets containing student and or event information.
Vanderbilt/ National Name Exchange Feeder Program, September  23-25, 2019 Nashville, TN
National Association of African American Honors Programs – November, 6-9;  New Orleans, LA
Society of the Advancement of Chicanos and Naive Americans (SACNAS) Conference – October 31 – November 2, 2019; Honolulu, HI
American Biomedical Research Conference for Minority Students (ABRCMS) Conference –  November 13-16: Anaheim, CA
SAEOPP National McNair Conference,  June – Atlanta, GA
Annual Ronald E. McNair Scholars Symposium at UC Berkeley. July – Berkeley, CA
University of Buffalo McNair Conference, July – Niagara, NY
